      • getResource

        public URL getResource()

      • listDependencies

        public Set<Dependency> listDependencies(ModuleRegistry resolver,
                                        Set<File> sourceRoots,
                                        ClassLoader compileClassPath,
                                        XMLInputFactory parser)
        List the dependencies of this resource. This recursively resolves all xsl:import and xsl:include that reference a component (either in the same module or in another one). It also resolves xsl:use-package and it resolves XPath extension functions defined in Java. Other dependencies are ignored. The dependencies may include (external) Component, UseXSLTPackage and (internal) JavaDependency. Imported/included resources from the same module are handled recursively.
